meanings.definition: Emitting light not caused by heat.
meanings.sent1: The fireflies in the jar looked luminescent in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The luminescent stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The luminescent jellyfish at the aquarium seemed to be having a glowing party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright, it was like a luminescent beacon in the room.
meanings.sent5: The luminescent paint on the walls made the whole room feel magical.

meanings.sent1: The luminescent moon cast a soft glow over the sleeping town.
meanings.sent2: The luminescent watch helped him see the time in the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The luminescent stars on her pajamas made her feel like a glowing superhero.
meanings.sent4: The luminescent eyes of the cat seemed to follow her every move in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The luminescent paint on the ceiling made it feel like sleeping under the stars.

meanings.sent1: The luminescent mushrooms in the cave lit up the path for the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The luminescent clock on the bedside table softly illuminated the room.
meanings.sent3: The luminescent fireflies danced around the garden, creating a magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The luminescent smile on her face brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The luminescent crystals in the cave walls sparkled like tiny stars.
